2.「むこうの世界で| しっぽ巻いて 逃げやがってから| ずいぶん ご無沙汰だったじ: It's been quite some time since you've run|away with your tail between your|legs, hasn't it?

3.「フフ 追いつめたですって？: Oh, you really think you've cornered me?

4.「おあいにくさま。| あなたは 誘い込まれただけ<heart> | キャハハハハ: Sorry to break it to you, honey...|But I lured you here. <heart>|Ahh ha ha ha ha!

6.「心臓のない 身体で | どれだけ戦えるか 試してあげる<heart>| たっぷ: I wonder how long a body without a heart|can fight? Have a taste of true helplessness!

8.「クソッ……腐りかけのトマトか。| こんがり焼きゃ 食えんだろ。: Damn it... these tomatoes are rotten. Can't|eat 'em unless they're roasted nice.

10.<center>あなたの心臓は|壊れてしまって 永遠に失われるの。: Your heart is broken, lost forever...

11.「カラッポのくせに うずきやがる。| さすがに 心臓のねえ身体は きついぜ。: Even though it's gone, I can still feel the|pain... it's tough having a body with no|heart.

12.「……<cs_pchero>！| いい時に 来てくれんじゃねえか。: ...<cs_pchero>! You sure came at a|good time.

13.「すまねえが 魔女のトマトどもを| けちらしてくれ！: Sorry, but I need your help clearing out these|rotten tomatoes!

18.「魔女を追いつめたつもりが 罠にかけられてよ。 | 悪夢のトマトパーティーだった: I thought I had that witch cornered, but she|played me. Talk about a nightmare tomato|party.

19.「ありがとよ <cs_pchero>。| お前には いつも 助けられちまうな。: Thanks, <cs_pchero>.|As always, you're a big help.

20.「そうだ あの クチうるさい娘……| アイリは 元気にやってんのか？<yesno: Oh, yeah, that loudmouth Aili...|Is she doing okay?<yesno><close>

21.「……そうか。まあ| あの嬢ちゃんなら 大丈夫だろ。: I see.... Well, I'm sure she'll be just fine.

22.「俺は こっちの世界に帰ってから| メルサンディ村を 拠点にして| 魔女を探して: I've been looking for a witch from Melsandy|Village ever since I returned to this world.

25.「お前も 知っているように| 俺の心臓は 魔女によって壊された。: As you already know, a witch destroyed my|heart.

26.「この身体には 心臓がねえ。| そこを 無理に動かしてるもんだから| ガタが来て: This body doesn't have a heart. I'm forcing|it to move by myself, and it's getting more|and more worn out.

27.「だがな……俺のチカラの源は 村人たちの希望。| あいつらが 信じてくれる限り: But... the real source of my strength is the|hope of the villagers. As long as they believe|in me, I won't die. No need to worry.

28.「これ以上 あの魔女の 好きにはさせねえ。 | まだ 気配が残ってるうちに追うぜ: I'm not gonna let that witch have her way any|longer. I'm going after her while there's|still time. See ya later.

29.「天才童話作家 パンパニーニじゃ！！: Pampanini, the genius fairy tale writer!

30.「メルサンディ村に残る 名作| 『小さな英雄ザンクローネの物語』を描いた| 張本: He's the one who wrote the classic "The|Story of Little Hero Zankrone," which remains|in Melsandy Village to this day! Woo hoo!

31.「<pc>。おぬし この村が | 本当の メルサンディ村でないことは| とっくに: You must've already known that this village|is not the real Melsandy Village, right?

32.「お察しの通り この村は 大魔王によって | わしの描いた童話の世界が 再現され: As you may have guessed, this Melsandy Village|exists as a product of the Great Demon King's|creation of my fairy tale's world.

33.「フン！ わしが描いてる途中で 死んだせいで | ザンクローネの敗北で終わってし: Hmph! You must have liked the tragic ending|that ended with Zankrone's defeat, since I|died before I could finish it!

34.「そんな わしが この世界にいる理由じゃが | ……じつは 自分の分身を 作品の: As for why I'M here... it's my personal style|to secretly insert my alter ego into my works.

35.「そのせいで どうやら この村が作られた時に | わしの魂も呼びもどされ この通: It seems that when this village was created,|my soul somehow found its way here and joined|with my alter ego.

36.「しかし……いまひとつ 解せん。| なぜ ザンクローネの死で 終わっていたはずの: But...I still don't understand. The story|should've ended with Zankrone's defeat... Why|did it start over again?

37.「おぬし ひょっとして| 小さな英雄の物語の続きを 誰かが| 描いているのを 知: Perhaps you know someone who is working on|finishing the story?

39.「わしの愛する 孫のアイリちゃんが！| わしの後を継ぎ 物語の続きを| 描きはじ: Aili, my beloved grandchild... She took over|and wants to finish off the story...?!

40.「……そうか！| それで ふたたび ザンクローネが現れ | 物語が動きはじめたん: Of course! Zankrone appears once again, and|the story begins to unfold once more!

41.「うっうっ。あの 病弱だったアイリちゃんが| 創作の喜びを 見出してくれるとは…: *sob, sob*... It makes this old man happy|that Aili has found the joy of creativity,|even in sickness...

42.「あい わかった！| 男 パンパニーニ 享年８７歳！| アイリちゃんの描く物語を: Hey, I got it! Pampanini, male, 87 years old!|Let's carefully observe the story that Aili|chooses to write!

43.「……おお 忘れとった。 | 頼みを聞いてくれた 礼をしとらんかったな。| これ: Oops, I forgot. I never thanked you for|lending me a hand. Here, take this.

44.「アイリちゃんの描く 小さな英雄の物語| ……続きが 楽しみじゃのう！: Aili's story of a little hero... I cannot wait|to see how it ends!
